thread.title: I am perfectly satisfied with this hotel! so nice place to stay!!
thread.title_full: I am perfectly satisfied with this hotel! so nice place to stay!! - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ria j
title: I am perfectly satisfied with this hotel! so nice place to stay!!
text:
장점:
신축호텔로 방이 매우 깔끔하고 깨끗하고 모던해요.
스테프들이 굉장히 친절합니다.
33번가 지하철 3분거리, 근처 한인타운 ,엠파이어 스테이트 빌딩 등 맨하탄 관광에 최적이에요.
통유리창으로 보는 맨하탄 도시 뷰가 만족스럽습니다.
단점: 히터 소리가 좀 커요. 복도 간격이 좁아 다른 방에서 소리가 클 경우 소음이 발생할 수 있습니다.
총평: 저는 매우 만족 했고, 다른분께도 추천합니다.
Staff is very friendly and professional.
Room is well designed for couple.
Very modern , compact designed room.
Front desk staff *Kim is good communicated with me.
*Jarif is so kind and fun. He help us to find good staff and post our korean card.
I am the first guest post the wall card of korean maybe I think : D It is funny and good to see.
* First day I stayed , I lost my trip document. when I knew that I am so panic.
but the staff in the lobby found that very important and valuable document. and That staff delevery it to my room. There is no missing document. I want to know who is that so kind of person. Thanks every staff : )
Every staff work that hotel is very professional and I think they really love their work and this hotel.
I extremely recommend that hotel. and you will be fully satisfied. thanks.
